title: Saintess
description: In a world where steam-powered locomotives rumble through a city aglow with magical lanterns, you are chosen as the Saint Maiden, a divine figure destined to unravel the Cathedral’s darkest secrets. Thrust into a realm of magic and steampunk, your sacred journey teeters between holiness and corruption, where every choice shapes a fate you can’t escape—save by the ultimate sacrifice. Customize your body, wield holy powers, and navigate a perilous path of temptation and duty, guided only by a goddess’s faint whispers. The Cathedral’s gilded halls hide vile rituals, and your resolve will be tested by lustful demands and treacherous mysteries. Will you purify this twisted realm, or succumb to its seductive decay?
author: Lekah, Dragon's Whore (DLC + Translation)
